title: memory corruption vulnerabilities
extract: Memory corruption occurs in a computer program when the contents of a memory location are modified due to programmatic behavior that exceeds the intention of the original programmer or program/language constructs; this is termed violating memory safety. The most likely cause of memory corruption is programming error.
extract_html: Memory corruption occurs in a computer program when the contents of a memory location are modified due to programmatic behavior that exceeds the intention of the original programmer or program/language constructs; this is termed violating memory safety. The most likely cause of memory corruption is programming error.
